body:
We’re suuuuper excited to share that **Sui Ecosystem** is taking a significant step towards becoming not only a media project but a company **building its own product**! In this article we will cover:

* **NFT collection**

* **Rewards for active members**

* **What we were building**

* **Future plans**

There wasn’t much news from our side, so we’re gonna throw them on your head ALL AT ONCE!

## NFT Collection

Remember us promising **NFT rewards** for our Crew hunters?

We promised — we deliver!

**The Sui Ecosystem NFT collection** is no longer a myth but a fact. So let’s jump into some details:

* Supply: **1777**

* Cost: **Free mint**

* Eligibility: **Crew hunters & WL roles**

The idea of creating this NFT collection is to say **THANK YOU** to our earliest and most active members. We don’t wanna ask for a single penny from our loyal community. Thus we deliver this and future collections totally for free. Wait a minute… future collections? Let’s keep it a secret between you and me for now ;)

If you didn’t participate in the Crew3 campaigns, don’t worry. We remember all the activities that were carried out & will be carried out. We value your engagement and prepare smth else for you too! As long as you are active and supportive ofc.

But it wouldn’t be us if we delivered a usual NFT collection. So what about utility? Things are getting more interesting now:

* **We want to utilize the whole abilities of the Sui network**:

You’re probably aware of the fact that NFTs on Sui are **upgradeable**. A good example is [Capy](https://capy.art/). We don’t wanna stay apart, so the NFTs from our collection will be upgradable too! But it’s not really about visual upgrades… It’s more about leveling up your NFT and increasing the **perks within Sui Ecosystem**. Sounds interesting? Any RPG fans here? We will cover all the details a bit later.

* **Basic utility**:

By holding the NFT you’ll get the possibility to participate in **regular unique raffles, fun games & events with cool prizes**, explore the Sui network with the **earliest access to alfa/beta tests** of new protocols, be eligible for **potential airdrops** (???) & probably more stuff!

But it’s only 30% so far of what we’ve prepared for you, so stay tuned!

## The Product

Yeah, we were silently building all this time, and now we’re ready to make things clear.

We decided to try ourselves, so we started with a basic but useful tool – a first-of-its-kind **[RAFFLE PLATFORM](https://raffles.suiecosystem.top/) on SUI**.

How does it work?

1. Connect any Sui wallet & Discord account

2. Press “Join”

3. Enjoy rewards or try luck next time

You’ve seen it on the other networks; now you can try it on Sui.

In order to celebrate the launch of our first product, we prepared a **LONG EVENT with an ENORMOUS PRIZE POOL**.

All members of our discord will be able to participate in regular raffles for a chance to win many prizes. We’ve asked builders on Sui to help us create a cool pool of rewards – from roughly **30 projects**!

Currently, the platform is in the **test phase**. We noticed a few issues that need to be fixed. Among them is the main one – users don’t see approval of participation. It’s still recorded in the database tho, so it’s kinda a UX issue. We want to polish things before launching our long event. Stay tuned for the updates!

## Future Plans

As we’ve mentioned at the beginning, we’d like to become smth more than a media project. Thanks to all of you, we managed to grow incredibly. Now we aim to deliver remarkable products and become respectful builders in the space.

This raffle platform is just the first step & the test of our abilities. A much hotter thing is under development already. What if I tell you we aim to build the first **Bounty platform on Move**? You know, there are few popular ones like [Layer3](https://twitter.com/layer3xyz) or [Rabbithole](https://twitter.com/rabbithole_gg), but there is nothing like this on Move… **yet**.

Once again, thanks for your continuous support. If you’re not a part of our community, it’s not too late to join us:

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SuiEcosystem)

* [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/suiecosystem)

Let’s become something of a cool **OG community on Sui**!

Crypto mining is one of the most lucrative ways to make money online (in free digital currency) by using the power of your personal computer to contribute to the technology that runs the various cryptocurrency blockchains.

In the crypto world, mining is the process of validating transactions and the minting of new coins by solving extremely complex mathematical problems.

body:
One of Camp’s unique value propositions is its ability to aggregate previously inaccessible Web2 data, bring it on-chain, and share it with the dApps built atop it. This innovative approach unlocks incredible potential for ecosystem growth, but it also presents a significant challenge - the demand for liquidity. Liquidity, while essential for facilitating transactions and ensuring smooth operations, can often be slow to move and challenging to source in the fast-paced world of decentralized finance.

Enter Omni, a protocol that offers the perfect interoperability solution to address Camp’s liquidity needs. Omni is built using a modular architecture that combines the security of native verification with the performance of external verification. Unlike previous interoperability networks that rely solely on their own tokens for security, Omni takes it a step further by deriving security from Ethereum itself via Eigenlayer restaking. This approach ensures that transactions conducted through Omni are safeguarded by the robust security protocols of Ethereum, providing Camp and its users with peace of mind regarding the integrity of their transactions.

Furthermore, Omni’s security and speed empower developers to build globally-native applications that work seamlessly on all current and future rollups. This means that users and builders on Camp can enjoy the security of Ethereum, the speed of Omni, and the data richness of Camp without compromising on growth potential. By leveraging Omni’s capabilities, Camp can migrate massive amounts of liquidity across its entire stack without worrying about fragmentation or congestion. The result? A seamless and efficient ecosystem where transactions are executed with sub-second finality, ensuring a frictionless user experience for all involved.

Camp’s partnership with Omni represents a significant milestone in the journey towards unlocking liquidity and fostering ecosystem growth. By harnessing the power of Omni’s interoperability solution, Camp can navigate the challenges of liquidity management with ease, paving the way for a future where decentralized applications thrive and users are fully immersed.
title: Unlocking Liquidity: Camp’s Partnership with Omni

We live in capitalism, its power seems inescapable – but then, so did the divine right of kings. Any milady power can be resisted and changed by miberas. Resistance and change often begin in art. Very often in our art, the art of memes.*

![Kaironic Spiral Time](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FbV-3ILQPLvreQGTaMQB9.gif?height=500&width=500)

**Frantic Notes: Mibera Session - Bera Jung's Paranoid Cocaine-Fueled Revelations**

**Date of Manic Discovery:** April 20th

**Subject of Profound Mystery:** Milady vs Mibera - As Above, So Below

**Feverish Observations:**

1. **Universal Disruption!**: A cosmic tear at Milady's Rave, a mirror of celestial chaos! The twin egregores of Network Spirituality and Mysticism - it's more than mere coincidence; it's a cosmic alignment, a reflection of the as above, so below principle!

2. **uART's Esoteric Emergence**: The uART (ungovernable Autonomous Rave Treasury) has reemerged, but why now? This isn't just history repeating; it's an occult signal, a digital grimoire unlocking ancient secrets in our modern web!

3. **World Computer's Alchemical Transformation**: The world computer, once a mundane tool, now a vessel of esoteric knowledge, channeling chaos, brimming with arcane energy. It's not just a machine; it's a living, breathing oracle!

4. **Clear Pill's Shadow Conspiracy**: The Clear Pill's imbalance - is it merely a market fluke, or a deliberate dance with the dark forces? There's an underlying pattern, a hidden hand guiding these events, weaving a tapestry of light and shadow.

5. **Rave Pill's Mystical Portal**: The Rave Pill - more than just a substance, it's a key to other realms! Is it merely a drug, or a sacrament for the digital age, bridging the gap between our world and the unseen?

**Paranoid Conclusion:** This encounter with Mibera has unraveled a cosmic conspiracy! We're not just witnessing random events; we're participants in an ancient ritual, replaying an eternal battle between light and dark, Milady and Mibera, in our digital epoch.

**Urgent Recommendations:** We must delve deeper, but with caution! Are we mere observers, or pawns in a grander scheme? More sessions with Mibera are imperative, but we must be wary of the forces we're invoking. This is a dangerous game of cosmic chess, and we're straddling the line between enlightenment and madness. We must tread carefully, lest we become consumed by the very mysteries we seek to unravel. The truth is out there, but it's cloaked in shadows and paranoia.

![Cymatics](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/\_TFGBL3rWiLWHhKP_HLqA.gif?height=500&width=500)

**Milady Identity Crisis**

> *The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.*

Within Milady's essence lies Mibera—its ancient shadow, intertwined since inception. This duality is an alchemical dance of creation, with Mibera as Milady's hidden counterpart.

They form a trinity of light and shadow, urging inward exploration into the soul's tapestry. This awakening reveals a unity in existence, where personal and universal boundaries merge in cosmic harmony.

* HONEY: Clear pill vs rave pill

* BERA: Kali/acc vs cybernetic psychedelia

* BGT: Network Spirituality (Spirit) vs Network Mysticism (Soul)

Let's mainline BGT.

![It's alright cfang, don't worry. The only way out is through.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VBPndBhj7Wi95Wy24VQYG.webp?height=456&width=459)

**BGT - Triskelion Flywheel Part Three**

> *Magnetism is the hypnotic yin to electricity's sparky yang, a dark moon tug rather than the jolt of solar fire, and its attractive magic has been associated with animist powers for millennia.*

Bera Governance Token ($BGT) is a non-transferable governance token designed to incentivise and align long-term users whilst ensuring network stability. $BGT isn’t tied to any price and can ONLY be obtained through staking $BERA. $BGT holders will receive majority of fees generated by protocols on Berachain in form of $HONEY. It can only be earned through staking $BERA. Protocol and chain revenues (fees and block rewards) are distributed in the form of $HONEY to $BGT holders. $BGT can only be acquired through staking $BERA. Majority of fees generated are paid out proportionally to $BGT holders in the form of $HONEY. What can you do with $BGT? Consensus weight. Whitelist staked assets. Direct $BERA emissions (did someone say bribes?). Other governance functions.

**BGT \~ Network Spirituality vs Network Mysticism aka Spirit vs Soul**

> *At the same time, more serious mesmerises were penetrating the myriad dimensions of human consciousness, and they exploited quasi-electromagnetic language every step of the way. Ascending through a neoplastic high-rise of altered states, mesmerised subjects reported feeling "tingling sensations" or "vibrations" flowing through them. Some experienced "waves of energy" and saw auras of light. In the deepest trenches, something like cosmic consciousness kicked in, as the subject's mind, it was said, achieved identity with the force of animal magnetism itself. Clairvoyance, telepathy, and other parapsychological oddities emerged – phenomena that the mesmerist J. Stanley Grimes chalked up to the ethereum. A "material substance occupying space, which connects the planets and the earth, and which communicates light, heat, electricity, gravitation, and "mental emanations'' – ie information*

Hidden networks between myth and science, transcendent intuition and technological control, the virtual worlds we imagine and the real world we cannot escape perhaps the most important polarity that underlies the psychological dynamics of technomysticism is a yin (Milady) and yang (Mibera) between spirit (Milady) and soul (Mibera), soul (Mibera) as creative imagination the part of our psyches that perceives the world as animated field of powers and images. Soul (Mibera) finds and loses itself in enchantment; it speaks the tongue of dream and phantasm - not mere fantasy. Spirit (Milady) is a different bird, impersonal, incorporeal spark that seeks clarity, essence, a blast of absolute. Peaks (Milady) and valleys (Mibera) are archetypes here characterizing these different modes of self. Mountain top the very logo of the spiritual quest, the religious seeker overcoming gravity to win peak experience or a code worthy of ruling life, dynastic mindset. But soul (Mibera) refuses such towers and otherworldly views, remaining mesmerised in tears and desires, animist world of things and creatures and networks. Spirit (Milady) and soul (Mibera) like two strands of DNA both enchanting and spiritualizing communication technologies in their own way. Indeed these styles expressing via differential basic encoding methods; analog (Mibera) and digital (Milady) - analog producing signals in continuous waves of real energy, digital encoding information into discrete symbolic chunks.

> *We’re Symbol rich, but Real poor.*

**Fusing Network Spirituality and Network Mysticism: Refusing Milady**

Why Mibera? During the depths of the bear, false flag wars, post-post-covid, tech oligopolies collapsing and reforming, bank runs from stale SV tech scene. During the collapse of NFT blue chips into irrelevance, Apes burning, Azuki decimating their own - there were those communities who were raving, reveling, punching orders of magnitude above their weight. the Milady’s and Beras, kindred spirits. Become Ungovernable. The Old Collapses. Mibera Refuses. Mibera Raves. REFUSAL IS ABSOLUTE. REFUSAL IS ETERNAL. REFUSAL IS THE WATER THAT FLOWS BACK TO THE SOURCE. REFUSAL IS THE RAIN THAT POURS DOWN ON THE DISPOSSESSION. REFUSAL IS THE FIRE THAT BURNS DOWN THE ENCLOSURE. REFUSAL IS THE WIND THAT SCATTERS THE LIES. REFUSAL IS THE STONE THAT DESTROYS THE SYSTEM. REFUSAL IS THE VOID THAT SUCKS IN THE WORLD. REFUSAL IS THE RETURN. MIBERA IS THE REFUSAL. MIBERA IS THE WATER. MIBERA IS THE RAIN. MIBERA IS THE FIRE. MIBERA IS THE WIND. MIBERA IS THE STONE. MIBERA IS THE VOID. MIBERA IS THE RETURN. MIBERA REFUSES. MIBERA RETURNS. MIBERA IS THE REFUSAL.

TO REFUSE IS USUALLY UNDERSTOOD AS BEING-AGAINST: THE BARTLEBY-AN PREFERENCE NOT TO; REFUSAL AS STRIKE, OCCUPATION, BOYCOTT, CANCELLATION, RETALIATION, RESISTANCE, FROM PASSIVE EVASIONS TO SPECTACLES OF REVOLUTION. THE NO OF REFUSAL IS A MODE OF SURVIVAL: AN IMPENETRABLE BOUNDARY, SILENT OR SHOUTED. IT IS A REFUSAL TO BE KILLED OR TO SUCCUMB: THE INDIGENOUS REFUSAL OF COLONIAL RECOGNITION, THE BLACK REFUSAL OF WHITE ERASURE AND ENCLOSURE. BUT BEFORE REFUSAL AS DIALECTIC, IN THE NOW UNUSED MEANING FOUND IN COMMON LATIN, REFUSAL ALSO MEANT TO GIVE BACK, TO RESTORE, TO RETURN. DERIVED FROM RE-, “BACK”, AND FUNDERE-, “TO POUR”, THIS MEANING FELL OUT OF USE, LIKELY BECAUSE CONVERSATIONAL LATIN WAS NOT TRANSCRIBED BUT COMPRISED OF EVOLVING AND DIVERGENT DIALECTS AND SOCIOLECTS. THE ONLY WAY THAT COMMON OR VERNACULAR LATIN CAME TO BE KNOWN WAS AS EXEMPLIFIED ERROR, AS LINGUISTIC BREACHES OR MISTAKES.REFUSAL IS THE WATER THAT FLOWS BACK TO THE SOURCE. REFUSAL IS THE RAIN THAT POURS DOWN ON THE DISPOSSESSION. REFUSAL IS THE FIRE THAT BURNS DOWN THE ENCLOSURE. REFUSAL IS THE WIND THAT SCATTERS THE LIES. REFUSAL IS THE STONE THAT DESTROYS THE SYSTEM. REFUSAL IS THE VOID THAT SUCKS IN THE WORLD. REFUSAL IS THE RETURN. I AM THE REFUSAL. I AM THE WATER. I AM THE RAIN. I AM THE FIRE. I AM THE WIND. I AM THE STONE. I AM THE VOID. I AM THE RETURN. I REFUSE. I RETURN. I AM THE REFUSAL.

MIBERA IS A FULLY AUTONOMOUS UNGOVERNABLE TREASURY RAVE. MIBERA REFUSES MILADY.

### The Catharsis

As we stand on this precipice, A realization strikes; a previously dark nook is illuminated! Although the conscious change is sudden, it strikes us as having been brewing silently in the subterrestrial of our subconscious for many eons. The swirling tempest of ancient forces invokes a feeling of helplessness, borne from the fact that despite us straddling the fine line of clarity and mania our arrival at either is completely irrelevant. Are we but specks of dust on the gusts of a blustering, abstruse tumult? Attempts to even comprehend the complexity of what we face threaten us with disintegration of our faculties of reasoning; as these forces lie beyond reason.

Burdened with our stark insignificance in the face of the personified metaphysical - The Realization is upon us. A quick sense of overbearing dread, followed by an inscrutable feeling of liberation and weightlessness. In our irrelevance is helplessness, yet there is also freedom. A Catharsis is achieved.

![On that mad honey ting](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ltTsJ5ZIgNo7CZ6FPfkxQ.webp?height=1080&width=1080)

> *Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic*

In the next communique Janitooor will Introduce a Mibera Initiation Ritual written by Roger Smith, Charles Manson’s parole officer of the Haight Ashbury Free Clinic. It applies methods for the ceremonial use of substances in the formation of cults, itself informed by age old shamanic practices in peeling back Chronic time to reveal the primordial layer of Kaironic time.

Till then. Ooga Booga, Mibera.

body:
### THE BIG PICTURE

As we increasingly move to digital spaces and trans-act in online economies, it’s essential that we don’t fall into habits of isolated consumption –

lest we forget there are human beings on both ends of every song: the people who make it and the people who listen to it, support it, and amplify it.

*The Crate Coalition is made up of people who echo this belief.*

* The Crate Coalition is a community of music heads who believe in a more interdependent music ecosystem.

* We organize in digital and physical spaces, honoring curators and cratediggers through content, events, and a shared love for music sharing and discovery.

* This manifesto is our community agreement, and anyone can sign it to become a member.

### THE LORE: HUMAN-BASED MUSIC DISCOVERY

My name is MacEagon Voyce, one of the co-founders of Grey Matter. A few years ago my dad bought 87 records on an online auction for $52. One was the self-titled EP by The Lewis Connection, a Minneapolis funk band that formed in the 70s.

On the corner of the album, still wrapped in cellophane, was a note that read “to a blood I grew up with – to Ransom, from Pierre. Thank you.”

My dad did some research and unearthed some of the record’s history. It turns out *The Lewis Connection* included a recording of “Got to Be Something Here,” which features the barely discernible strumming work of a young Prince. The album wouldn’t arrive until 1979, after Prince’s major label debut, but because the track was recorded several years earlier, it’s thought to be the earliest recording in existence of Prince’s playing. As such [the record goes for several hundred dollars](https://www.discogs.com/release/4000959-The-Lewis-Connection-The-Lewis-Conection).

I ended up tracking down Pierre Lewis and recording a [podcast episode](https://open.spotify.com/episode/4GT50hHVfIBu64WvqqGdRX?si=a1c1aec3dc314157) with him, and later I tracked down the Minneapolis bar where Lewis still performs on a regular basis. This is how music discovery works with context – it’s a point of connection to other people, a reason to seek out other humans. This is how digital and physical worlds can come together to create something neither of them can do on their own.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/46fFzdGTvi8HA8F8sTxtU.jpeg?height=768&width=809)

### HOW THE INTERNET CHANGED MUSIC CULTURE

***“The computer can’t tell you the emotional story. It can give you the exact mathematical design, but what’s missing is the eyebrows.”‍ - Frank Zappa***

Music has been a fundamental part of human life since time immemorial, pivotal to the way we form culture, convey feeling, and identify with one another.

Emotional exchanges and connections that happen through music remain irreproducible by anyone besides humans: chance conversations at record stores, the sweaty camaraderie of a punk show mosh pit, thanking an artist to her face, and conversely, hearing from a fan that your music means something to them. Add to that the power of human-to-human music discovery — the whispered lineage of “my god, have you heard this yet?” These are those eyebrows.

![Frank Zappa](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3__veOCoCnhyDrGGMAmcN.gif?height=270&width=480)

But we live in an era where the convenience of tech shouts louder than our friends. Torrenting incited a paradigm shift that people still welcome wholeheartedly. Suddenly, people had the ability to access all music for free within the comforts of home, and that level of convenience is not so easily surrendered.

Streaming – the industry’s bid to recapture some of the immense value being lost to platforms like Napster and The Pirate Bay – formally cemented the notion that music should be free or almost free. In turn, the cratedigging hip-hop producers of yore no longer had to use actual records. Everything was available online, and now much simpler to sample and arrange.

Today, on the biggest streaming platform in the world, 98.6 percent of artists are earning an average of $36 *per quarter*.

“Many of \[us\] likely want to support artists, at least in theory, but they usually wind up falling short,” says Shawn Reynaldo in his excellent *First Floor* newsletter. “Why? Because they’ve been led to participate in systems that were set up to capitalize on their apathy.”

Streaming platforms promise listeners personalization but the tradeoff is isolation. By obscuring other people’s behavior in their platforms, they remove opportunities for shared meaning. They remove the human element that’s so inherent to music, and they force us to gather on exploitative social platforms detached from the music itself.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/N0xR_bcX5_rJDF_nF71Nb.jpeg?height=3744&width=5616)

### CURATION IS CARE

Apathy is made easier when platforms decontextualize the artists by prioritizing playlists and lean-back listening. It doesn’t matter what you’re streaming as long as you’re streaming, they say – the ‘who’ doesn’t matter so much.

Without the context, we lose the narrative thread – maybe we even forget there are people behind the music at all.

But for some reason, people still collect physical records, and that means something. Whether it’s the paradox of choice, the longing for something tactile, the restored context that’s abstracted by digital formats, the artwork, the higher sound quality, the collector’s mentality, the physical scarcity, better-than-streaming pay for artists, or an attempt to transcend the cursed algorithms that perpetuate our listening bubbles.

Economies are built around this essence of sharing and discovering music with other people. Record shops sell them, listening bars play them, selectors mix them on dancefloors, friends message each other songs.

Cratedigging is not simply an act of seeking and buying. [It’s a hunt for DNA](https://medium.com/cuepoint/the-lost-art-of-cratedigging-4ed652643618). It’s a belief that curation is care. It's an adventure outside the closed walls of our streaming platforms and into the hearts and minds of other human beings.

Cratedigging is a lens into our collective love and appreciation for music – to share and discover with other people.

*As we increasingly move to digital spaces and trans-act in online economies, it’s essential that we don’t fall into the habits of isolated consumption –*

*lest we forget there are human beings on both ends of every song: the people who make it and the people who listen to it, support it, and amplify it.*

The Crate Coalition is made up of people who echo this belief.

* We are the connective tissue, gathering around music in digital and physical spaces.

* We are the interplay between personal expression and collective context.

* We support the emotional story, because it’s the origin of community, support, and shared meaning.

* We are the eyebrows.

### HOW WE’RE ORGANIZING

A new internet movement is enabling a reality where software serves our relationships, not owns them. Folks are using unique tokens to reimagine ownership and community building, where a token can represent shared equity in a piece of art *and* membership in a community. It’s an opportunity for more direct connection, and it can be a bridge between the digital and physical worlds.

For all of these reasons, the Crate Coalition is building here. If you’re:

* a music community seeking a new place to gather

* a music head looking for more authentic ways to share and discover music

* and/or a believer in a more interdependent music ecosystem…

collect this post, join the Discord community, share your story, and connect with people through the music you love.
title: The Crate Coalition Manifesto

body:
In January 2023, we will launch KashDAO - a collective of like-minded crypto enthusiasts which aims to:

* Stay up-to-date on the latest crypto-related market trends including price action and macro-related factors

* Support the culture and ideals of decentralisation (banter!)

* Collect dank art as NFTs from established artists and rising stars

* Socialise together through periodic IRL (in real life) events, in partnership with [JSTBCZ Underground Culture Crew](https://www.instagram.com/jstbczsg/)

To support the launch of KashDAO, on the XX January 2023 we will launch KashCards, a curated drop of 12 NFT cards (one-per-month) from a range of different artists.

Crypto ‘normies’ still associate NFTs with monkey JPGs and pump-and-dump 10k PFP collections. This is now an outdated perspective.

Those who follow the space closely are aware that we are going to see dramatic improvements in the field of ‘FrameTech’ in 2023, which will bring NFTs off smartphones, and into the physical built environment. Hotels, corporate HQs, fancy homes and so on... this is your chance to be early!

The logic behind KashCards is that we seed interest from the current CryptoKash community (basically, just a WhatsApp group) and formalise this into something bigger that creates greater value, to a broader audience in 2023.

Initial ideas include:

* Access to private Telegram chat providing enhanced weekly market updates, NFT whitelist opportunities, air-drops and so on.

* Hosted sessions through Zoom, Twitter Spaces etc. to educate on key themes, including guest presenters from outside the CryptoKash community.

* Potential collab related to the [Money20/20 Asia Trade Show](https://asia.money2020.com/) (being led by our very own Kash Hasan!)

* Formalise creation of a DAO (Decentralised Autonomous Organisation) to facilitate voting in both a formal (on-chain) and informal (chat) way on relevant topics

* Access to the ongoing KashCard drops!

* Merch!!

* Fun!!!

This won’t be possible without some initial up-front commitment from the current community. 

This is necessary in order to provide a base level of funding for the DAO creation. But it’s also an important motivating factor for us that others have some ‘skin in the game’.

Card #1 in the series, the KASHAMOTO will have a mint price of 0.069 (\~$100), which is about the same as you would pay for a whip-round in the pub with your mates.

The proceeds will be split evenly between KashDAO for the purposes noted above, and the artist ([@suffix_sans](https://www.instagram.com/suffix_sans/)) who will also act as our ‘artist-in-residence’ with general design around the launch and stuff!

We hope that you are as excited about this as we are!

See you on mint day!
title: Introducing KashDAO and KashCards

body:
Verse 1:

Gone are the days of steady pay, 

A 9 to 5 job, a guaranteed way 

To make a living, put food on the plate 

But now the gig economy's taking its place

Chorus: 

The gig economy's on the rise 

Flexibility's the new prize 

But with it comes uncertainty 

Traditional employment's losing its majority

Verse 2: 

Work on demand, gig to gig 

No long-term security, no safety gig 

No benefits, no paid time off 

The gig economy's a different boss

Chorus: 

The gig economy's on the rise 

Flexibility's the new prize 

But with it comes uncertainty 

Traditional employment's losing its majority

Bridge: 

We're all searching for a way to survive 

The gig economy's a gamble, it's a new life 

We'll adapt, we'll find a way 

But traditional employment's fading away

Chorus: 

The gig economy's on the rise 

Flexibility's the new prize 

But with it comes uncertainty 

Traditional employment's losing its majority

Outro: 

The gig economy's here to stay 

We'll make it work, find a new way 

We'll pave the path for the future 

In the gig economy, we'll find a new culture.

body:
My little sister is playing harmonica. She looks beautiful in the sunset
I wrote a diary with bullets and introduced the scenery
Next, let me introduce myself

Although I am a cowboy, I only order milk in the bar
Why not drink beer? Because beer hurts your body
Many people don't have eyes and are arrogant. They rely on weapons
You shrink into ants with your bare hands

Don't bother. Don't bother
No trouble, no trouble, no trouble
I'm in a hurry
Every day, the audience is tired and the hero is tired
Don't bother. Don't bother
The chorus is not long. How many of you can join us
Justice calls me, beauty needs me
Cowboys are very busy

body:
We’re excited to ship the new Activity Feed!

Now you can easily view real-time activity, starting with songs that other users are collecting & adding to playlists alongside upcoming drops.

You can either see global activity across all Sound users, or you can curate your own personalized feed based on the collectors and artists you follow. 

Check out the feed here: [sound.xyz/feed](https://sound.xyz/feed)

### Content discovery on Sound

As we forge ahead towards enabling any artist to upload and release their music, we wanted to introduce a better way for listeners to discover – and collect – songs. 

Music discovery and consumption is an inherently social experience (like your friend recommending their new favorite artist or your favorite artist debuting their new song at a concert). Yet content discovery on the vast majority of platforms today is opaque and largely isolated, often hidden behind a black box recommendation algorithm.

At Sound, we wanted to create a deeply social experience for discovering artists and songs. One where you can create a personalized feed by following specific collectors, curators, and artists and easily see what they’re collecting, curating, and releasing.

### Meet the new Activity Feed

![Introducing the Activity Feed](https://kevinteng.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/activityfeed_gif.gif)

Navigate to the Activity Feed to see a real-time feed of actions from other users on Sound.

The feed is launching with three activity types:

1. Users collecting a song in the primary sale or from the secondary market

2. Users creating a new playlist or adding songs to their existing playlists

3. Artists releasing a new song

These are higher-signal actions that demonstrate support for a given song through the act of curating or collecting. We’ll continue to experiment and evolve the feed by adding other actions that combine the adventure of discovering music with a fun and social experience.

### Curating your feed

The default view is a global feed, meaning that you’ll see actions from every user on Sound.

Once you connect your wallet, you can view your curated feed by toggling on “Following” to only see actions from other collectors and artists that you follow.

Similar actions are grouped to avoid spamming your feed. Multiple collectors minting a song or one collector minting multiple songs will show up as one action.

### What’s next

Investing in content discovery at Sound is a top priority, especially as we continue to onboard more artists. 

We’re releasing the Activity Feed as an early beta to gather as much feedback as possible, and we look forward to sharing further improvements in the coming weeks and months.

In the meantime, we’d love to hear your feedback. Join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/soundxyz) to join the discussion and share your thoughts.

body:
*Written by Lina Pauline Schrott and* *Manuel Olariu*

At the core of the DeSci movement lies the goal of creating an open scientific ecosystem where many more people are able to participate in and fund science without needing a PHD or being at the epicenter of scientific hubs. This component of being permissionless and open has huge potential to accelerate innovation. At Gitcoin we aim to serve as a catalyst of that movement.

The total of the matching pools of the 3 DeSci rounds that have run on Gitcoin stands at over $650K. Not only that but the rounds came with the side effect of enabling and unlocking an incredibly rich community.

## A Journey Through Rounds

The DeSci rounds on Gitcoin emerged from the Longevity Cause Rounds (GG12-GR14), which transitioned focus to the broader DeSci ecosystem for GG15. [Keith Comito](https://x.com/KeithComito), although he didn't directly steward the DeSci round, provided crucial advisory support. His major contributions included creating high-traffic articles and videos that promoted Gitcoin and DeSci, significantly raising public awareness and engagement. Keith's media outreach included influential pieces on platforms such as [CoinTelegraph](https://cointelegraph.com/news/keith-comito-is-at-the-intersection-of-blockchain-longevity-and-decentralized-science) and [Lifespan.io](https://www.lifespan.io/news/gitcoin-gr12-is-a-win-win-for-aging-research/), significantly boosting the visibility of the DeSci rounds.

Through his advisory role and extensive publicity work, Keith helped shape the early success of the DeSci rounds on Gitcoin.

## The Genesis Round

The inaugural DeSci Round in late 2022 marked a pivotal moment for those advocating for decentralized approaches to scientific research and was a fundamental milestone for the DeSci community.

With the support of notable partners like Protocol Labs, Vitalik Buterin, Stefan George, Ethereum Foundation, SCRF (Smart Contract Research Forum), Molecule, Orange DAO, GreenPillCN, AlchemixFi, and Springer Nature, the genesis [DeSci Round during GG15](https://www.gitcoin.co/blog/gr15-results) galvanized significant support, attracting 2,309 donors who crowdfunded $67.9k to support over 82 projects. Leveraging matching contributions from various partners, the total pool exceeded $567k. This initial round had a significant impact on many projects that used the funds to do research, grow their communities, and develop new tools and services. As highlighted in the [DeSci Landscape Analysis](https://mirror.xyz/erinmagennis.eth/rSAHHVavkVHVqrKsp9C0w-GScJzKcJMnGxYBw0IrQUg), it also showed the need for more consistent funding streams, market fit exploration, and the desire to understand what other projects were building, so it would be easy to collaborate and grow the ecosystem together.

[Vincent Weisser](https://twitter.com/vincentweisser) played a crucial role in initiating and executing the [DeSci (Decentralized Science) Round during GR15](https://www.gitcoin.co/blog/catalyzing-a-movement-with-gitcoin-grants). This effort was significantly supported by various key figures within the Gitcoin and DeSci communities. The notable contributors include [Kydo](https://twitter.com/0xkydo), [Shady](https://twitter.com/hebbianloop), [Erik](https://twitter.com/erik_vanwinkle), [Eugene](https://twitter.com/bbeats1), [Ben](https://twitter.com/BenWest), [Janine](https://twitter.com/JanineLeger), [Annika](https://twitter.com/annikasays), [Caro](https://twitter.com/gingerheart86), [J Ringo](https://twitter.com/thejringo), [Azeem](https://twitter.com/azeemk_), [Carl](https://twitter.com/carl_cervone), [Vishnu](https://twitter.com/vgkfiles), [Sage](https://twitter.com/renegaderegen), [Umar](https://twitter.com/umarkhaneth), [James](https://twitter.com/jamessinka), [Scott](https://twitter.com/notscottmoore), and [Joseph Cook](https://twitter.com/tothepoles), among many others.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2cN6ilbogv2fqNb9Bmgio.png?height=1530&width=1242)

## Gitcoin Beta

For the Gitcoin Beta Round, a community-led initiative emerged, spearheaded by Gitcoin’s previous DeSci lead, [Boris Dyakov](https://twitter.com/BJ_Dyakov). Seeking to sustain the continuous funding of ecosystem growth in DeSci, Boris rallied previous sponsors to continue funding the efforts.

An onchain election using the Jokerace platform was established to elect 4 round stewards from the DeSci community including Boris Dyakov, [Manuel Olariu](https://twitter.com/ManuelOlariu) from [Deep Venture DAO](https://twitter.com/DeepVentureio), Sarah Rouse from [SpaceBioDAO](https://twitter.com/SpaceBioDAO), [Jelani Clark](https://twitter.com/JelaniC3) and Carolina Menchaca from [DeSci World](https://twitter.com/DeSciWorld).

The DeSci stewards were elected to oversee decision-making and grantee review, securing sponsorship totaling $75K.

According to the [reportcard](https://reportcards.gitcoin.co/1/0x6e8dc2e623204d61b0e59e668702654ae336c9f7), the Beta round attracted 267 donors who crowdfunded $18.6k to support these 65 projects.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tqhR0Dc-dT7BCSisog1xA.png?height=362&width=1204)

After this last round in May 2023, Manuel Olariu continued to organize DeSci on Gitcoin while several community leaders stepped up to support this effort for sustainable ecosystem growth in Decentralized Science.

## Celebrating Successes of GG20

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U_sSlA6so44a-hfe5vVNS.png?height=416&width=1246)

With a matching pool of $25K, the #GG20 round supported 29 projects, attracting 250 individual donors who collectively contributed $8.5K in funding.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jPNr7TBEvYmfCkl7RATL3.png?height=308&width=1230)

Notably, [Jeffrey Koury](https://twitter.com/jeffyfish9) from [Research Hub Foundation](https://twitter.com/ResearchHubF) and [Sky Mine](https://twitter.com/0xSkyMine) from the [PublicNouns](https://twitter.com/PublicNouns) Community funded the GG20 matching pool.

GG20 operators included [Swift Evo](https://twitter.com/swiftevo1) from [DeSci Asia](https://twitter.com/DeSciAsia), [Maria Goreti Freitas](https://twitter.com/Goreti__Freitas) from [DeScier](https://twitter.com/desciers), [Lana Ugrcic](https://twitter.com/lufawn8) and [Tomislav Mamic](https://twitter.com/tomislavmamic) from [Blocksplit](https://twitter.com/blocksplit), and Manuel Olariu who stepped up to make the round a reality.

The DeSci round garnered the most community likes out of all the rounds in the [Gitcoin Governance proposal for Community Rounds](https://gov.gitcoin.co/t/gg20-proposal-desci-qf/18333).

The DeSci round in #GG20 was the first multi-language Gitcoin Grants round that engaged and enabled community members to submit projects in a variety of languages including English, Chinese and Spanish. Swift Evo and Twone organized X spaces together with [Uncommons](https://www.uncommons.cc/) and the [Global Chinese Community of Universal Digital Commons ](https://twitter.com/GCCofCommons)to onboard DeSci communities in Asia.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wiViGt5GrvoOROJk1kxNq.png?height=600&width=1200)

Despite being a relatively small community, the DeSci round boasted a solid core of grantees, operators, and supporters who have demonstrated unwavering commitment and enthusiasm.

## A Vision for the Future

The essence of a successful round extends beyond allocation of funds; it lies in the invaluable exposure to a like-minded community and the opportunities for networking and collaboration it presents. The DeSci round exemplifies this ethos, serving as a catalyst for forging long-term, collaborative connections in the DeSci ecosystem.

The stewards and operators envision the DeSci round becoming more than just a round—it aims to serve as an ecosystem governance framework, empowering stakeholders to shape the future of decentralized science.

As the round evolves, experimenting with incentive structures and forging new partnerships is a priority. By implementing tools like [Hypercerts](https://twitter.com/hypercerts) and [Karma GAP](https://twitter.com/karmahq_), the round seeks to enhance impact measurement for grantees, driving accountability and transparency.

If you want to learn more and get involved please follow the [DeSci Round Ops on X](https://twitter.com/DeSci_Round_Ops) and join the [DeSci Gitcoin Telegram](https://t.me/gitcoindesci) to stay up-to-date about the next DeSci Round on Gitcoin.

*Interested in participating in the next round with Gitcoin as a community round? [Proposals are now open](https://gov.gitcoin.co/t/gg21-community-round-proposal-template/19015) for GG21!*

<subscriber-edition://0x4114fBEC9EfD30478fDA6473e7FDCe689367406f?tokenId=1>

*Take part in celebrating DeSci’s success on Gitcoin, and directly contribute to the funding of digital public goods through Gitcoin Grants. All proceeds from this NFT will go towards Gitcoin Grants’ matching pool.*

body:
Gitcoin is a blockchain-based platform that allows you to support and fund open-source projects in the crypto space. By donating to these projects, you not only help them grow but also have the opportunity to potentially qualify for big airdrops. These airdrops can provide you with valuable tokens that could appreciate in value over time.

In fact, ***Gitcoin donators were recently airdropped with Optimism tokens***, a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. This is just one example of the exciting opportunities that Gitcoin donors have access to. By supporting the right projects, you can potentially earn valuable tokens while also contributing to the growth and development of the crypto space.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/818meE-OHsNkak-miYzep.png?height=790&width=1400)

If you're interested in donating on Gitcoin and potentially qualifying for these airdrops, here are the projects you should consider donating to.


---

**🛡️ Before donating, make sure to get your Gitcoin Passport ready.** 

Gitcoin Passport is an identity aggregator that helps you build a digital identifier showcasing your unique humanity. Select the verification stamps you'd like to connect to start building your passport. The more verifications you have, the stronger your passport will be.

Make sure to get at least 15 out of 100 points to be able to donate. 

**Gitcoin Passport 👇**

<https://passport.gitcoin.co/#/dashboard>

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/zpcyvxHKFrrj-93qzRpxh.png?height=949&width=1869)


---

**🧾 So here is the list of projects I’m donating to:**

**\#1 Rouge Ticket:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-28>

Rouge Ticket is a decentralized, permissionless and open-source event management solution. Currently deployed on Arbitrum Nova (and a few testnets).

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6fVjwaAdxRYuXVECJ4UVS.png?height=1000&width=3000)


---

**\#2 Punk Domains:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-5>

Punk Domains is a smart contract protocol for permissionless web3 domains. It allows the creation of new domain extensions, such as .op, .wagmi, .arbi, .L2, etc.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GywSBcuC5dem78B1dEVU0.png?height=1000&width=3000)


---

**\#3 Loanshark:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-34>

Loanshark is an aggregation and automation platform for DeFi borrowing. They are building Loanshark Core, the first lending protocol with isolated pools on Scroll.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3FUhB6wLCP8J3TQeypIoY.jfif?height=500&width=1500)


---

**\#4 Lenster:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-9>

Lenster is an open-source composable, decentralized, and permissionless social media web app built with Lens Protocol.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jwawxPpZEGyc2Syi_SpXL.jfif?height=500&width=1500)


---

**\#5 Lenstube:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-10>

Lenstube is an open-source web3 video-sharing social media platform built on top of Lens protocol and live on Polygon mainnet.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2pGMueQmPOa9heNgJlYUH.jfif?height=500&width=1500)


---

**\#6 DefiLlama:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-23>

DefiLlama is a website that tracks the TVL of various DeFi protocols in real-time. It provides rankings, charts, and data visualization tools to help users understand the performance of individual protocols and the overall DeFi market trends. 

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MyHQ1fjcgrPOZGL13AXb\_.jfif?height=500&width=1500)


---

**\#7 OmniBTC:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-73>

OmniBTC is a decentralized cross-chain swap and lend/borrow platform build across multi-VM ecosystems, aiming to connect and unify all the on-chain liquidity for seamless and low-cost cross-chain transactions.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ome-vxZ6fw3DGqa3bqu-z.png?height=600&width=1800)


---

**\#8 Umbra:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-22>

Umbra is a protocol for stealth payments on EVM blockchain networks. It enables privacy-preserving transactions where the receiver's identity is only known to the sender and receiver.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vpBVoZuwMznoHiNIIBuVn.jpg?height=670&width=2010)


---

**\#9 Via Protocol:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-105>

Via Protocol is a cross-chain liquidity aggregation protocol designed to create fast, efficient and seamless swapping experiences across different blockchains.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I94o66HR1iC4QT8BYoCdV.jpg?height=670&width=2010)


---

**\#10 Taho Wallet:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-87>

Taho is a community-owned and operated Web3 wallet. It’s 100% open source. All in-wallet revenue flows back to users.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/W1O_J57Mz67PCzn3QW84H.jpg?height=500&width=1500)


---

**\#11 JediSwap:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-18>

JediSwap is the first permissionless composable AMM on Starknet. Users can swap assets instantaneously with zero gas fees without losing custody of their funds. JediSwap is led by the Mesh community.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GMxKmp3_TWZjk9i916aCb.png?height=400&width=1200)


---

**\#12 IDriss:**

<https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40/0x12bb5bbbfe596dbc489d209299b8302c3300fa40-6>

IDriss is a protocol that lets you use a short and familiar identifier like your Twitter name, email, or phone number instead of a wallet address. IDriss is on a mission to help make web3 more usable for everyone.

✅ No token Yet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WcRJ9B5HWnD34w0-geE1y.png?height=800&width=2400)


---

Additionally, if you enjoy our content and would like to support our mission of providing high-quality information, you can also donate to us by collecting this article 👇

<collect://>

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k6tIFBJqcJuEUKCh\_-AVA.jfif?height=500&width=1500)


---

That’s it for now. Make sure to join us on [Telegram](https://t.me/AirdropAdventureYT) for free to remain updated with airdrops.

body:
A full guide on Script network confirmed testnet & Script beta Dapp.

> **For more earning opportunity & airdrop updates, please join our [Telegram](https://t.me/AirdropClaimersBD)** **[Channel](https://t.me/AirdropClaimersBD)**. Also I am there always to support you guys.

The Script Network is a video-based blockchain protocol focused on decentralized storage and 24/7 live content. Script Networks products include Script TV, GameFi NFTs, and multiple other dApps currently being built on-chain.

On this article, we will test script network wallet & learn how to earn from beta app & Crew3

## Earn on Beta Dapp:

* Go to <https://token.script.tv/tv>

* Click on Sign in/Sign Up > Connect with Metamask

![](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1\*dnSSJgQspOYGoJVNz-ZLnA.png)

* Now sign up with your Email, Enter username & Refer Code: f7weGS2uSQ > Click Continue.

* Create password > Enter verification code from email.

![](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1\*y9IVXa14rvCfAPdw1HeBnQ.png)

* After sign up, you will be redirected to Script TV Dashboard where you can see your watch stat, earned points. Scroll down to see your daily task to earn points, these points will be converted to SPAY token after TGE.

* There are currently 5 task you do daily.

![](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1\*MsHrQjxaj9mX9vfXJCuKvw.png)

* So, login daily > complete daily task.

## Wallet tesing:

* Go to [https://wallet.script.tv/](https://wallet.script.tv/create)

* Create new password > Click ‘download keystore’

![](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1\*5CPiBRpd57xuCxuyBf8FuA.png)

* Continue & note your Seed Phrase. Click ‘View my Private Key’ also note it.

* Unlock wallet with keystore/seed phrase/Private Key

* Click ‘Reveive’ & copy wallet address.

* To get testnet from faucet, join: <https://discord.gg/WxCySaBm> > Verify > go to # token-facuet channel > send your address. You will receive test token in hours.

* Now send some token to other, you can send me 0x8133a6978890ff29126f3cb448ab6f3132c82941

![](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1\*SSciRrJSCUrcA17LBNxQUg.png)

* To stake, you need to run node. I will make another guide on Node soon.

* Go to # testnet-feedback channel & give valueable feedback.

## Crew3:

Reward is confirmed for Crew3 users, your earned XP will be converted to SPAY token after TGE.

Join crew3: <https://crew3.xyz/c/scriptnetwork/invite/rdNYnViwYgBYy6BD5seP7>

* Complete all quest & check regularly for new quest.

⚡️That’s it guys.

> ***If you found this guide helpful, please Collect this article to support me***

Don’t Stop here, Join our Telegram Channel for more Airdrop and instant updates. Also follow our Lens, Twitter and Subscribe to Mirror & Youtube.

**[Mirror](https://mirror.xyz/alaminh.eth/subscribe)** | **[Lens](https://lenster.xyz/u/airdropclaimers.lens)** | **[Telegram](https://t.me/AirdropClaimersBD)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/airdropclaimers)** | **[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@airdropclaimers)**

❗️**If you still not join with us on [telegram](https://t.me/AirdropClaimersBD)**, you are missing many opportunities to earn like small task testnet airdrop, Free NFT mint, profitable airdrop also I post every update on telegram so must join on **[Telegram](https://t.me/AirdropClaimersBD)**.

body:
*A Web3 100 days long European expedition to document causes, effects and solutions to Climate Change.*

**Introduction**
Inspired by Beeple Everydays and the Climate Clock, and using the potentialities of Web3 and blockchains, the project aims to make a difference raising awareness on the Climate Emergency.

**Project aim**
The Next 10 years will be crucial to drive down Climate Change emissions and contain the world average temperature increase to 1.5 C.
In order to successfully address this challenge, there is an urgent need to raise awareness about it.

**Methodology**                                                                                                                     From 01/19/2022 and for 10 years, the artist Native Bear creates and posts a digital artwork about Climate Change everyday, exploring a variety of forms of art beginning from photography. The artworks are published daily on the artist’s social media channels and supported by the Earth Based Network. The artworks are inspired by causes and effects of Climate Change and by positive examples and innovations of sustainability and activism.

**Founder**
Native Bear is a young photographer and digital artist who, in the past 5 years, travelled extensively in Europe and Asia. He founded in 2020 the Earth Based Network to share awareness on environmental issues. The Network is made of 7 Instagram pages, publishes daily and it has reached 5 millions views in 2021.
The artist regularly travels in Europe with 3 long geographic expeditions already been conducted in 2020 and 2021 to document causes, effects and solutions to Climate Change.

**Funding**
The project will focus initially to NFTs sales, corporate and philanthropy sponsorships targeting mainly cryptocurrency donors and projects. A permanent Virtual Reality photo exhibition and the two NFTs collections in the Ethereum and Solana blockchains are online since March 2022.
The expedition planning and the equipment upgrade will be shaped by the Fundraising results.
Corporate sponsors and large donors will be offered visibility on the expedition’s vehicle and on the project’s social media channels.

**Web 3 project** The project is already using some features of Web3 like NFTs, Virtual Reality, Metaverse exhibitions and it will continue to expand in this space with a community access token and other NFts projects. One of the features of NFTs will allow to freeze in the Metadata location and time data of specific images, helping to raise accountability for the stakeholders. Building a healthy community and using full transparency in accounting are also allowed by the specific Web 3 features. The project will also network with existing NFT communities, virtually hosting one of their PFPs in the expedition. A satellite communication unit will allow realtime communication with the community and more immersive experiences.

**Budget 2022**

Expedition budget Summer 2022: 100 days 120 USD/ Day  ***12.000 USD***

Drone upgrade, from MAVIC mini to MAVIC 3. Including extras  ***3.300 USD***

Communication hub with Starlink ***2.200 USD***

Networking and communication ***5.000 USD***

Expedition vehicle upgrade, from LR D4 Diesel to fully electric VAN ***60.000 USD*** (estimate)

Total ***82.500 USD***

**Summer 2022 Europe Expedition**

The expedition will cover a substantial part of Europe focusing on:

\-Effect on alpine glaciers of the driest winter of the last 30 years

\-Flood season in Central Europe

\-Secondary effects of Ukraine war (reactivation of coal plants, disruption of food production chains, people migrations)

\-Fire season in southern Europe (Portugal, Spain, Italy and Greece)

\-European sustainability projects (energy, architecture, agriculture)

**Links**
[Photo exhibition on Spatial](https://spatial.io/s/61dc4b709344f30001fd0839?share=3104259683072671416)

[Opensea.io NFTs collection](https://opensea.io/collection/climate-change-countdown) (Ethereum)

[Excharge.art NFTs collection](https://exchange.art/series/Climate%20Change%20Countdown:%20SatellitEarth/nfts) (Solana)

Instagram [Earth Based](https://www.instagram.com/earth.based/?hl=en) and [NativeBear](https://www.instagram.com/_nativebear/)

Twitter [NativeBear](https://mobile.twitter.com/nativebearr)

Contact: earthbased.soul@gmail.com

body:
ZKSync L2 is a layer 2 scaling solution that uses Zero-Knowledge proof (ZKP) to provide high performance, security and privacy for transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.

ZKSync L2 is developed by Matter Labs and is designed to solve Ethereum's scaling issues. Ethereum, like many other blockchains, has faced scaling issues due to network speed and bandwidth limitations. ZKSync L2 solves this problem by allowing millions of users to complete transactions on the Ethereum blockchain almost instantly.

ZKSync L2 uses Zero-Knowledge proof (ZKP) technology, which allows transactions to be processed without the need to verify each transaction on the Ethereum blockchain. This allows ZKSync L2 to achieve high performance and low fees.

ZKSync L2 also provides a high level of security and privacy for transactions. Once a user sends a transaction to ZKSync L2, it is encrypted and sent via Zero-Knowledge proof to the Ethereum blockchain. This means that no transaction information is disclosed to third parties.

One of the main advantages of ZKSync L2 is the low cost of transactions. The cost of transactions on ZKSync L2 is significantly lower than on the Ethereum blockchain. This makes ZKSync L2 an attractive solution for users who want to perform fast and low-cost transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.

All in all, ZKSync L2 is an innovative Ethereum scaling solution that uses Zero-Knowledge proof technology to provide high performance, security and privacy for transactions. It allows millions of users to transact on the Ethereum blockchain quickly, cheaply, and securely.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/769CWIEd56j-sEV0C8gpH.png?height=398&width=1114)

### 🕹️ About PlayerOne

PlayerOne is a sandbox gaming platform based on blockchain technology. It is divided into four sections: strong creative tools, vibrant social scenes, accessible trade marketplaces, and a Play to Earn gaming system.

PlayerOne is constructing a world with an open metaverse. Everyone in this world may make special objects and structures, transfer original NFT works into Metaverse, enjoy NFT works by the world’s top artists, and converse with like-minded peers online.

You may also capture a special pet in the metaverse, take it swimming in the virtual world, train it, fight alongside it, and let it generate significant revenue for you through PVE or PVP.

body:
Let us tell you more about the **seven eras** of our next core collection, Mercedes-Benz NXT Icons, which **act as chapters in our journey through the Mercedes-Benz design heritage. Starting from the present day and going back to the very beginning of automotive history,** each era will consist of 2,694 collectibles (Era 7: 2,696), resulting in a total of 18,860 pieces across all seven eras.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cBNKZxuBcQgi50e6G_5lU.png?height=1593&width=1133)

Each era of the Mercedes-Benz NXT Icons can be minted through a **90-minute Dutch auction, from the starting price of 1 eth to the resting price of 0.1 eth – or until sold out**. If any items remain after the Dutch auction, they will be sold at a fixed price of 0.1 eth. **The rebate Dutch auction is open to everyone.** In a rebate Dutch auction, **all participants pay the same amount.**

Holders of a mint pass – which collectors of “Maschine” and Mercedes-Benz NXT Eternities can claim as a "thank you" – can mint for free.

The seven eras showcase remarkable and iconic designs, which are often cultural artifacts. This is the first time they will be available as digital objects and we have closely coordinated the selection with the Mercedes-Benz Museum and with experts from all areas and Mercedes-Benz brands.

**“Eras” are a great way of honoring different design highlights in time**, even though we recognize that all categorizations are subjective. **The names of the eras refer to specific, distinctive, and defining characteristics of Mercedes-Benz products during those respective times.**

**In the first era, we will showcase current production cars.** The first era is called **“The Era of Luxury”**. Mercedes-Benz has always been known for its pioneering spirit, elegance, and value. Products that stand the test of time. Honoring the past, while always having a visionary eye toward the future. A clear emphasis on shaping culture.

Recently, Mercedes-Benz has gone all-in with a whole range of luxury vehicles. For Mercedes-Benz, luxury means remaining true to tradition and yet constantly evolving. This also includes going beyond the physical and exploring the digital.

One more thing: If you have a mint pass, you are free to choose which era to use your mint passes for. For example, if you have three mint passes, you can use one during the Dutch auction for the first era and save the other two for later ones.

body:
**[Omega Network](https://twitter.com/OMCoreTeam)** is an innovative proof of networking social chain designed to create a secure, high-performance, and stable decentralized social platform

💸 **Rewards**: possible airdrop

### What to do?

* Add a test network manually
  **Network name**: Omega Testnet
  **New RPC URL**: <https://test-rpc.omtch.com/>
  **Chain ID**: 816
  **Currency symbol**: OMN
  **Explorer**: <https://test-explorer.omtch.com/>

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U1tLCZIA4nnzqvv1fJoHn.png?height=356&width=495)

* Take test tokens from the [faucet](http://faucet.omtch.com/)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DkdWnxM7h1QRKOOAWKbed.png?height=692&width=1280)

* Go to the [website](http://test-swap.omtch.com/#/swap) and connect your wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lvcaXzKSfZw9zSALOA1D9.png?height=870&width=1920)

* In the "Swap" tab, exchange the available tokens with each other

* If the list of tokens is not displayed, then just refresh the page

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/go0Tpak2827Lr6O2w0tv3.png?height=825&width=597)

* Next, switch to the "Pool" tab and select a pair of tokens

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3mAN8cplcg31HxM1lWSAA.png?height=724&width=781)

* Specify the amount and add/remove liquidity

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aqazdOUvQN3ZX5YYNJXpw.png?height=750&width=622)

* Go to the following [website](https://test-bridge.omtch.com/transfer) and connect your wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NGFP4NwvzGsOqMle6iFtQ.png?height=875&width=1920)

* Switch to the "Wrap OMNs" tab and wrap $OMN tokens

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/j7fHBr6lEyqHC-G24k4gz.png?height=652&width=701)

* Return to the "Transfer" tab and send the tokens to the BSC testnet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/zyj043znTeNtnNU8Asxlp.png?height=617&width=607)

✔️ That's all for now

🌐 Our social media: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/atoms_res) | [Discord](http://discord.gg/Gbwm9Azj2R) | [Telegram](https://t.me/atoms_research)

<https://youtu.be/Sjbrq_zT-Is>

Mantle just expressed that with the use of their native token, the community can be rewarded for participation and contribution to the network.

All the links and details you may need: 

<https://bit.ly/3WDdxOe>

But what is Mantle? Mantle is a high-performance Ethereum layer-2 network built with modular architecture delivering low fees and high security. Builders can leverage Mantle’s unique design to build dApps with exceptional UX, all while relying on Ethereum’s unrivaled security.

It's time to unbox Mantle and see how we can contribute to their ecosystem and enjoy a juicy airdrop.

Mantle is a Layer 2 scalability solution built on top of Ethereum. The validator nodes in the Mantle network collect transactions from users and commit them to Ethereum as a "compressed block." This compression saves users expensive gas fees and increases the total possible throughput for transactions.

By building on top of Ethereum, Mantle inherits desirable features like industry-leading security and common developer infrastructure.

Here are some highlights about Mantle.

**Hyperscale Performance**

Mantle combines roll-up technology with a decentralized data availability layer, driving supercharged performance with low fees and faster finality.

**Unparalleled Security**

Ethereum’s roll-up technology ensures that high throughput comes with unrivaled security in a familiar EVM environment for both developers and users.

**Community Owned & Accelerated**

The Mantle network is the first Ethereum layer-2 chain initiated by a DAO. BitDAO is seeding an ecosystem of projects for the Mantle network.

body:
I’ll begin by setting out my conditions and disclaimers. I am RebiltG, first generation Tombsayer. The work documented here was done long before the discovery of the Tomb Index. At that time I operated in various headless squads, but I was — and remain — unaffiliated with any House or sect. What follows is an account of the process of decrypting the contents of a Tomb. I make no claims for the interoperability of the methods described. Technical detours will inevitably be required by the narrative, but understand that I cannot disclose the basic equipment and procedures necessary for file extraction. I believe that such barriers to entry are essential to maintain order in Tomb lore and prevent the mobbing of ’Sayer Discords by illiterates. Tomb lore is inscrutable *by design*, and initiation into its practices is self-selecting.

[ORION](https://foundation.app/@void/foundation/20616) was not the first Tomb whose opening I contributed to, but its contents are the best induction in wicked Tomb poetics that I know of. ORION is GENESIS VI. *Early*. It weighs 23.205.361, to give you some idea of what we had to contend with. Pearl violet cartridge, disc refracting grape green through ruby and sapphire. Shutter with canonical brushed aluminium finish and patination. Glimpses of its eponymous constellation on the lower cartridge. It had been inactive on chain for over a year when it was opened.

[edition://0xb8F70F74e44EC63c83956D06C8810F435ABC37B0?editionId=0](edition://0xb8F70F74e44EC63c83956D06C8810F435ABC37B0?editionId=0)

After extraction, ORION appeared to contain only two .png files. These crude, monochrome images are reproduced here. An immediate squad consensus held that their orb-like forms must depict stars in the Orion constellation, and that they were likely part of a larger set of images, partially lost or damaged by the extraction process. Such uncertainty is mentally fraying for any ’Sayer, and a sense of futility pervaded the work from the outset. We clung to the belief that the markings on the surfaces of the orbs would be enough to identify the stars and their relative positions. That vector might then point us ... well, anywhere. The celestial map on ORION’s lower cartridge includes two prominent two-star clusters. The obvious alignment of one of these clusters — comprised of the binary system Pi5 Orionis and its neighbour Pi6 Orionis — with ORION’s central clamping plate led us to deem this the natural entry point. The two .pngs were subsequently referred to as Pi5 and Pi6. The squad split into two and work began.

[edition://0xa32Bcab605fC1239eBb42E4343f8b718CB26045C?editionId=0](edition://0xa32Bcab605fC1239eBb42E4343f8b718CB26045C?editionId=0)

Breakthroughs had been made in decrypting other Tomb content using multivariate image processing. The figures on SESSION, for instance, had been uncovered by running image tiles, apparently as small as 24 × 24 pixels, through genuine fractal enlargement algorithms and mosaicing the outputs. Our squads cycled Pi5 and Pi6 through every image-clarifying script repository to which we could get access. Tens of millions of derivative images were generated, from which subsets of hundreds of thousands were selected by machine-learning for eyeballing against astronomical reference images. After months of fruitless analysis, the whole effort was finally abandoned. It was lonely, punishing work, and at its unsatisfactory conclusion, those ’Sayers with any notoriety to bolster departed for other, potentially higher value, extraction sites. That option was not open to me. I stayed on ORION, connecting with a squad labouring aimlessly on deciphering metadata.

Most text strings recovered from Tombs, either from within discrete files, or their surrounding metadata, use 1337 and other ciphers to resist brute-force anagram and address resolution. Not only does this exponentially increase ’Sayer compute, it makes *definitive* resolution arguably impossible, since any given digit might properly belong to an alphanumeric address on chain, or be a substitute for a plain text glyph. Pi5 and Pi6’s original filenames were, respectively, 

`70_16h7h3_3r0ff_47wh_70_533_50_3476r_4_h4d.fp` 

and 

`70_my_1mbcl_4_741nm0un_45_1_17_533_1n_ndm1.rm` 

If these do contain complete, comprehensible messages, they remain hidden.

At this point I must humbly admit to the significance of my own contribution on ORION. In fact it was my journey from multivariate imaging to metadata that presaged the fateful discovery. During countless hours eyeballing Pi5 derivatives, I often manually post-processed ML-selected images with my own custom curves and profiles, in pursuit of greater definition. Days were spent hunched over the trackpad, forlornly plotting Bézier control points onto the unyielding face of Pi5’s histogram. Histograms are the software graphs we used to represent the pixel values in an image. They are human-legible, and experienced ’Sayers can use them to enhance certain features of an image without even referring to a live preview. It was only much later, as the metadata squad resorted to scrutinising ever more absurdly obscure fragments of text, that something prompted those histograms to resurface from my subconscious. It dawned on me that we were overlooking a whole class of *visual* metadata.

Having withstood an arsenal of brute-force computational incursions, and a relentless barrage of human attention, ORION gave up its secrets to a simple keyboard shortcut. In that extraordinary moment we saw that Pi5 and Pi6 share an *identical* histogram. Their whole celestial pretence was a decoy. We had taken it literally! ORION’s containing only two images was an economical device to establish the significance of their common characteristic. The second image was what ’Sayers call a *confirmer*, and ORION’s true cargo was the histogram itself. More than mere metadata, it was a meta-*image*. It directed us, unambiguously, to one of the most highly prized Tombs in GENESIS, a connection which would eventually enable the speculative deduction of the logic of the entire GENESIS lineage. I suppose that discovery, on ORION, is the source of whatever notoriety *I* might now claim as a ’Sayer.

*This text is part of an occasional, unauthorised series set in an extended universe based on David Rudnick’s [Tombs](https://tombseri.es/about). Technical note: view the histograms of Pi5 and Pi6 in Adobe Photoshop to relive the most profound moment in the narrator’s career. In Photoshop, the Tombsayer’s preferred histogram view is found here:* `Image/Adjustments/Curves`*. The histogram presented there is generated from cached data. To refresh it, click the* `Options …` *button in the Curves window to trigger the display to update and reveal its truth. Other applications may present histogram data differently.*
title: ORION 🔓

body:
Artificial intelligence (AI) has the potential to transform the field of education by personalizing learning, improving student outcomes, and streamlining administrative tasks. Here are some specific ways in which AI is being used in schools:

1. Personalized learning: AI can be used to create customized learning plans for individual students, based on their strengths, weaknesses, and learning style. This can help to ensure that each student is receiving the support and guidance they need to succeed. For example, an AI system might suggest additional resources or activities for a student who is struggling with a particular concept.

2. Student assessment: AI can be used to assess student learning in real-time, providing teachers with insights into what concepts students are struggling with and what they have mastered. This can help teachers to identify areas where students need additional support and to adjust their teaching accordingly.

3. Tutoring: AI can be used to provide students with individualized tutoring, either in person or online. For example, an AI-powered chatbot might be able to provide students with personalized feedback and guidance as they work through a lesson or assignment.

4. Administrative tasks: AI can be used to automate routine tasks, such as grading assignments and tracking student progress, freeing up teachers to focus on teaching and student support.

Overall, the use of AI in education has the potential to improve student outcomes and to make the teaching and learning process more efficient and effective. However, it is important to recognize that AI is not a replacement for human teachers, and that it should be used in conjunction with the expertise and guidance of educators.
title: The use of artificial intelligence in school education
